statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, post_id, action FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, post_id FROM user_interactions WHERE post_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id, action FROM user_interactions WHERE action = 'like' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT action FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id, action FROM user_interactions WHERE action = 'like' ORDER BY post_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS num_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_interactions >= 5;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, action, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id, action ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT * FROM post_interactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT interaction_type FROM post_interactions WHERE post_id = 789 ORDER BY interaction_type DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profile WHERE user_type = 'admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM post_interactions WHERE post_id IN (456, 789);
SELECT post_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM post_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, user_type FROM user_profile WHERE user_type = 'admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM post_interactions WHERE user_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'comment';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profile WHERE username LIKE 'joh%' OR email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email, user_type FROM user_profile WHERE user_type IN ('admin', 'moderator') AND username <> 'admin';
SELECT * FROM posts
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1
SELECT post_id, COUNT(like_id) AS likes_count FROM likes GROUP BY post_id
SELECT * FROM likes WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT post_content FROM posts ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_content LIKE '%database%';
SELECT post_id, COUNT(like_id) AS total_likes FROM posts LEFT JOIN likes ON posts.post_id = likes.post_id GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, like_timestamp FROM likes ORDER BY like_timestamp DESC;
SELECT post_id, count(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM comments GROUP BY post_id HAVING total_comments > 10;
SELECT * FROM shares WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY share_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE post_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM likes WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY like_timestamp DESC;
SELECT comment_text, comment_timestamp FROM comments WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY comment_timestamp ASC;
SELECT post_content, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM posts JOIN likes ON posts.post_id = likes.post_id GROUP BY post_content;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT post_text, post_timestamp FROM Posts WHERE post_id = 100;
SELECT comment_text FROM Comments WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY comment_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_likes FROM Likes GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_likes > 5;
SELECT post_text, post_timestamp FROM Posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, post_id, comment_text FROM Comments WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY comment_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id, like_timestamp FROM Likes WHERE user_id = 3 AND post_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, share_timestamp FROM Shares WHERE post_id = 4;
SELECT username, post_text, comment_text FROM Users JOIN Posts ON Users.user_id = Posts.post_id JOIN Comments ON Users.user_id = Comments.user_id;
